::FZ::

FZ chuckles without humor, listening to Iron Raptor's words.

"On the contrary," he says, "I'm sure many of the Alliance bots here 
still like to fight. And the battle in the Alliance base has already 
been won, by the Alliance, even with split forces."

He looks around the battlefield for a second, keeping track of Iron 
Raptor as he does, just in case.

"But there isn't much more to be achieved at this battle. I will 
order my troops not to fire unless fired upon. I suggest you do the 
same."

He switches his comm to an Alliance frequency. "All Alliance members, 
do not fire on the Maximals unless they fire at you. Alliance members 
inside the Cybertronian Fire, meet up witht he prisoners and escort 
them out. If you are met with resistance, use deadly force. The 
Maximal commander has agreed to a ceasefire, as most of the 
possibilites of this battle have been exausted."

Not to mention Maximal reinforcements were here, he adds silently to 
himself. He looks at Iron Raptor. "Your turn. If your troops keep 
firing, so will mine."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor heard another voice, her scanners going through her 
systems 
> and finally coming up that it was FZ.
> She simply leaned her weight on her one leg and snapped her head 
towards the 
> sound of jets as he approached, watching every one of his moves as 
he came 
> to land close by, but keeping her sword in hand just in case.
> She looked up at the bot as he stood there, slightly feeling small 
from his 
> size, but he didn't intimidate her more then that.
> Her hair fluttered slightly in the wind but she payed no mind, her 
thoughts 
> on what was going on now. A possable end to the fight.*
> 
> " Don't we all?"
> 
> * She relaxed and sighed.*
> 
> " I've alread sent a transmission out to the Maximals to cease 
fire, if they 
> do as they're told then you can get you men back. Provided that you 
don't 
> just turn around and start firing at us again.
> We have more important things to do then fight, like repair the 
damage to 
> our ship and so on. You have a battle at your own base to deal 
with, so I 
> don't think you need this fight too."
> 
> * Iron Raptor shifted her weight onto the other leg*
> 
> " It's been a long day for all of us. Enough is enough. As soon as 
the 
> Maximals cease, we'll start. How does that sound?"
> 
> * She waited calmly for his answer, just wanting everything to get 
done and 
> over with. But her stance was still broad shouldered and straight, 
giving no 
> sight to any weakness, but her voice was not firm, but normal.*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
